Comments
February 12, 2022
benzoil
Disappointing in every way. The sculpt is reused and still way too small. The dial designer obviously hasn't read the comic he is from. During his time on the Future Foundation he has taken a vow of pacifism and basically never fights, and is instead the "babysitter" of the FF kids. Doesn't have glasses or a book as he often portrayed in that run, and almost nothing representing his actual role on the team.
February 21, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
So much for bigger sculpts, this guy is the same sculpt and same size as the dragon man from the previous set! Still a killer dial, but it annoys me that instead of giving him glasses, he’s just a color swap of the last version
February 11, 2021
Goop
I like the design of this one. He starts with your typical running shot Energy Explosion with 3 bolts that will just annihilate swarm teams (being a giant helps him target). However with a range of only 4 you know he is going to get charged on soon. So he drops to CCE for the rest of his dial and picks up quake and charge himself (dont forget giant reach too).
